wikipedia_page.main: Philip Trevor Kerslake  (born 24 May 1959) is a Welsh-born New Zealand speaker, author and television presenter who has appeared on the weekday morning series, Good Morning and in other New Zealand media. He is also a cancer survivor.

link_mentions.page: List of New Zealand television personalities
response: * Phil Kerslake – leadership coach, speaker, author and television presenter
